definition: to be both mentally and physically exhausted (idiom)

sentences.english: Considerable attention is given to the action of centrifugal force in grinding wheels.
sentences.chinese: 磨牀砂輪的離心力作用受到相當的關注。

sentences.english: Conclusions Elderly patients with chronic heart failure can tolerate carvedilol treatment.
sentences.chinese: 結論老年心力衰竭患者基本可以耐受卡維地洛治療。

sentences.english: Dealing with the latter can be anguishing and taxing.
sentences.chinese: 與後者打交道會讓人心力交瘁，痛苦不堪。

sentences.english: Avoid doing cardio that will slim the legs.
sentences.chinese: 還應儘量避免做能瘦腿的心力運動。

sentences.english: Sixthly, this article outlined Zhang Junmai's thought of "Mental effort".
sentences.chinese: 第六，本文概述了張君勱的“心力”說。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the curative effect of synergsim on headstrong heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討聯合用藥治療頑固性心力衰竭的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of valsartan in the treatment of congestive heart failure(CHF).
sentences.chinese: 目的旨在探討纈沙坦在充血性心力衰竭中的治療作用。

sentences.english: If you are constantly overwhelmed, you will burn out.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不斷受到打擊，你將會心力交瘁。

sentences.english: The spin-drier use centrifugal force to made the cloth dry.
sentences.chinese: 甩幹機用離心力讓衣服變幹。

sentences.english: Biventricular pacemakers were initially approved for people with severe heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 雙腔起搏器最初被批准應用於嚴重心力衰竭的患者。

sentences.english: Lowering high blood pressure still prevents congestive heart failure and promotes kidney health.
sentences.chinese: 降低血壓仍可防止充血性心力衰竭，促進腎臟健康。

sentences.english: The level of BNP was the important indicatrix of the CHF diagnose and therapeutic effect.
sentences.chinese: BNP水平是心力衰竭診斷及評級療效的重要指標。

sentences.english: Only then transfers however sees toward being mentally and physically exhausted.
sentences.chinese: 才轉然看到過往的心力交瘁。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of Carvedilol in the treatment of chronic heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察卡維地洛治療慢性心力衰竭患者的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the tolerance to carvedilol in elderly patients with chronic heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 目的評估卡維地洛治療老年心力衰竭患者的耐受性。

sentences.english: When the dog shakes, centripetal forces pull the water away.
sentences.chinese: 狗一抖動，向心力就使水脫身而出。

definition: to tax one's mind and body/demanding (work)/dedicated (worker)/hard-working
to exhaust one's thoughts and ingenuity (idiom); to think sth through thoroughly/to rack one's brains/to leave no stone unturned
to do all one can/to give all one has
lit. to spit out one's heart and spill blood (idiom)/to work one's heart out/blood, sweat and tears
to work with one's brains/to rack one's brains/to worry
to pay/to invest (energy or time in a friendship etc)
to concentrate entirely on sth/fully engaged/with full force
to be a tax on (one's mind)/to bother/to trouble/to be concerned
painstaking effort/to take a lot of trouble/laborious at pains
